name: tor-dice-checker
description: checks rolls against the success criteria of the The One Ring system, and is best used in conjunction with the custom dice roll tables (https://wiki.roll20.net/The_One_Ring). Basically it will try to output a valuable message about the roll's success, and works best of supplied with a Target Number, like so: /roll 1d12 + 3d6 > 14checks if you have rolled EDGE on your feat-die with the attack rollthis only works if your macros are following a clear structure
authors: Michael Heilemann, Stefan Unterhuber, Stuart Johnson, David Dom√≠nguez, Eric Le Bourvellec, Michael (aka Aragent) I
